attributes.action: introduce the necessary legislation to make it mandatory for Senior Citizens free Travel Permits to be accepted nationally on all local buses and local trains outside the immedite county of residence of the permit holder, including all Transport for London services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would remove the anomally of free Travel Permits not being recognised by neighbouring local authorities, particularly when the permit holders lives a short distance from a county border. It would encourage to use  public transport instead of private cars for all short journeys.
